HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"All these skinny bitches on spring break made me realize that I will still choose food over exercise and just wish for a nice body"
"Why are the Macedonian border police firing tear gas at the illegal immigrants? Shower them with bullets. That'll learn the ungrateful scum."
"What's the difference between my wife and my dog?\n\nAnimals have rights."
"Good. Women are faggots anyways. #VoteTrumpGetDumped #NoGirlsAllowedTwitter"
"RT @ProWhites: Nothing drives the #AntiWhite nuttier than exposing #WhiteGenocide"
"@Feathers__ I hate men they are gross and I will beat them all up for you."
"RT @Super_Moniac: @DRUDGE_REPORT @trump2016fan These BLM parasites have motivated America to get off their ass and overthrow globalist PC establishment"
"Lock Up Your Dogs and Hide Your Preteen Daughters, The Muslim Refugees Are Coming"
"Just said to my dad \"You know what I don't like?\" and his immediate response was \"CHICKS WITH DICKS"\"
"@addamschloe @James_May_Not @Salon Hating white people isn't racist cause white people r the vessels through which all evil enters the world"

Sentiment.text: I will beat them all up for you
Lock Up Your Dogs and Hide Your Preteen Daughters, The Muslim Refugees Are Coming
You know what I don't like?
Hating white people isn't racist cause white people r the vessels through which all evil enters the world
